title.rendered: Convergys India Services Private Limited to support Smile Foundation’s Mission Education programme

content.rendered:
Convergys India Services Private Limited to support Smile Foundation’s Mission Education programme

Convergys India Services Private Limited (CISPL) has associated with Smile Foundation for a Mission Education programme (a national level programme) to support basic education and healthcare for 200 underprivileged children. The centre is located in Gurgaon and the objective of the initiative is to improve the learning levels of children along with holistic development of through curricular and co-curricular activities.

Convergys is the world leader in customer experience outsourcing. Convergys infuse innovation, insights, and operational excellence to make every experience great for your customers and your business.
